item.jumbofurnace.orthodimensional_hyper: This construct can't exist in your puny three-dimensional universe!
Put this in a Jumbo Furnace's upgrade slot to smelt more things simultaneously
jumbofurnace.jumbo_furnace_info_tooltip: Place 27 furnaces in a 3x3x3 cube to create the Jumbo Furnace
jumbofurnace.advancements.story.assemble: Place 27 furnaces in a 3x3x3 cube to create the Jumbo Furnace
jumbofurnace.advancements.story.obtain_j: Create a Jumbo Furnace item (possibly by smelting 27 furnaces in a Jumbo Furnace)
jumbofurnace.advancements.story.obtain_o: Create an Orthodimensional Hyperfurnace (possibly by smelting eight Jumbo Furnaces with an ender pearl)
jumbofurnace.advancements.story.fully_up: Upgrade a Jumbo Furnace with a full stack of 64 Orthodimensional Hyperfurnaces
